thread.title: Good hotel great location
thread.title_full: Good hotel great location - Review of Days Hotel London- Waterloo, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Frew83
title: Good hotel great location
text:
Had to visit London for meetings and picked this hotel to stay in for the two nights I was in the city.
The location of the hotel is superb, couple of minutes walk from the nearest Tube - Lambeth North - and if your feeling fit it's about 15-minutes walk to Westminster and the HoP.
The hotel is clean and tidy and seems to be well run with happy staff. My room - 406 - was clean and well presented, OK it was not the biggest room I've had but it had everything you need - good bed, tea and coffee making facilities, small shower room with toilet, desk, hanging area for jackets and a place to put your suitcase. The towels provided were massive, seriously big!
Breakfast was good and as normal nowadays serve yourself.
The area round the hotel is safe - Police Station across the road! Handy for the IWM as well - I could see it from my rooms window.
All in all a good hotel that I will use again mainly for the location but also for the attitude of the good humoured staff and the nice clean rooms.
